body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Supremacy. My name is Matthew Reed and I'll be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Helen. Could you please provide me with your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. Next, could you share your phone number with us? It will only be used for communication regarding your inquiry.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my phone number is five five five, three four six, two one eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, I've noted down your details. Is there anything else you'd like to share or inquire about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Helen. Thank you for reaching out to us. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to contact us. Have a great day!
